snippet: A crew of six owners will meet with a handful of players on Tuesday in New York without Commissioner Gary Bettman or the union’s executive director, Donald Fehr.
abstract: Six NHL owners will meet with handful of players in New York to discuss lockout without commissioner Gary Bettman or players' union leader Donald Fehr.
lead_paragraph: A crew of six owners will meet with a handful of players on Tuesday in New York without Commissioner Gary Bettman or the union’s executive director, Donald Fehr.

headline.seo: Gary Bettman and Donald Fehr Won’t Be at Meeting N.H.L. Labor Meeting
headline.main: Bettman and Fehr Won’t Be at Meeting
